text: All the Right Moves is a 1983 romantic drama movie directed by first time director Michael Chapman and starring Tom Cruise, Gary Graham, Lea Thompson, Craig T. Nelson, Chris Penn, Sandy Faison, Terry O'Quinn. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1983 romantic drama movies Category:1980s sports movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American sports drama movies
title: All the Right Moves (movie)
